scripts.claudia:create:dev: ./node_modules/claudia/bin/cmd.js create --region ap-southeast-2 --api-module lambda/index --use-local-dependencies --set-env-from-json lambda/env/dev.json --version dev --config claudia.dev.json --name sportseye-backend-dev
scripts.claudia:create:test: ./node_modules/claudia/bin/cmd.js create --region ap-southeast-2 --api-module lambda/index --use-local-dependencies --set-env-from-json lambda/env/test.json --version test --config claudia.test.json --name sportseye-backend-test
scripts.claudia:create:prod: ./node_modules/claudia/bin/cmd.js create --region ap-southeast-2 --api-module lambda/index --use-local-dependencies --set-env-from-json lambda/env/prod.json --version prod --config claudia.prod.json --name sportseye-backend-prod
scripts.claudia:create:ukprod: ./node_modules/claudia/bin/cmd.js create --region ap-southeast-2 --api-module lambda/index --use-local-dependencies --set-env-from-json lambda/env/ukprod.json --version prod --config claudia.ukprod.json --name uk-sportseye-backend-prod --runtime nodejs12.x
scripts.claudia:create:uktesting: ./node_modules/claudia/bin/cmd.js create --region ap-southeast-2 --api-module lambda/index --use-local-dependencies --set-env-from-json lambda/env/uktesting.json --version prod --config claudia.uktesting.json --name sportseye-backend-uktesting --runtime nodejs12.x
